Set a new benchmark with your Faction and this hot feature:

▶ NEW FACTION HQ
- Make your Faction unstoppable with a total of 15 Faction Upgrades!
- Each in-app purchase automatically generates special Gifts for all your Faction mates!
- New Faction Mercenary will Defend your base as a 7th unit in all defensive battles, using one unstoppable Power-Up!
- Donated Power-Ups in your Faction HQ are used by Faction Mercenaries.

▶ TWEAKS & IMPROVEMENTS
- Collecting Coins and Oil is as easy as a simple Swipe! Tax Office and Oil Collector are required.
- Chat in any Language you want!
- Speed up Atlas skills
- HQ can be looted during invasion
- Underwater Faction War Battles give more Thorium
- Players below level 13 can’t attack Air and players below level 28 can’t attack Underwater
- Faction Battle Attack & Defense Bonuses count only one Military Council
- Added New Quests
- Improved Solo Events
- Lots of UI improvements
- Multiple anti-hacking measures
- Bug fixes

Running out of space? Not anymore, thanks to 6 new Expansion Tiles you can unlock to further build your base, plus more in this latest update!

NEW FEATURES:
- Grow your base even more with 6 new Expansions!
- Boost your Energy supply by repairing the Dam.

- Fixed the automatic scroll in Chat
- Units with the fewest Recovery Points are now always used first
- Various bug fixes

Breach the Enemy's Tower Defenses in the all-new Faction game mode!
- Establish a new Base together with your Faction
- Unveil the Fog of War, claim Points of Interest and collect a new Faction Resource
- Build and Upgrade new Faction buildings

Enjoy iOS 10 features in World at Arms Update 23 — exclusively on iOS devices!

- iOS EXCLUSIVE: REPLAYKIT. Broadcast your genius strategies, cunning tactics and glorious victories to the world with iOS 10 ReplayKit! Available on all iPhone 5 and newer models, plus iPad Pro.

- iOS EXCLUSIVE: STICKERS. Express yourself in full force with 36 unique WaA-themed stickers for iMessage. Includes memorable landmarks, units, characters and giant robots — for FREE!

- ENERGIZER BOOST. Want more power? Come and get it with an Energizer Boost! These consumable items will supercharge all your Badges for a limited time.

- BADGE SWAP DISCOUNT. Customize your VIP experience even more with a huge discount on swapping your current Badges for others.

Get ready for Faction Wars 2.0 in Update 24 for World at Arms! Gather allies from all around the globe—as you'll need many of them to achieve victory.

- FACTION WARS 2.0: From now on, Faction Wars will be built around teamwork and endurance, instead of base-rushing. The power of Faction Turrets has been dramatically increased.
- BREACH-UNIT STATS REVISED: Take advantage of units specialized against each type of tower (Grenade, Pistol, Knife and Specialist).
- DONATION CAP & PRICES REVISED: You will now be able to donate up to 17 units. Units that are more powerful will provide significantly more donation points to your Faction pool.
- FACTION POWER-UPS REVISED: Their price was reduced and stats were increased.
- FACTION WAR REWARDS INCREASED: As Base Breach becomes significantly longer, Faction efforts will also be rewarded accordingly.
- ROBOTS' POWER REVISED: Atlas repair price decreased. Atlas and Prometheus now draw their power only from units deployed with them into battle.
- TOWER BONUS REVISED: Tower Bonus will now scale with Deployed Units. The higher the power of your deployed army, the higher the Tower Bonus.
- MAJOR ECONOMY REVISION: Unit prices reduced. When a unit's Recovery reaches 0, it is destroyed. To help you get familiar with the new system, all units in your Stash will be set to Max Recovery (for this Update only).

NEW FEATURES:
- CONQUEST CRESTS: Based on consecutive Global Conquest victories, Factions will be rewarded with special insignias.
- COLLECTOR BUILDING UPGRADES: With each upgrade, the range of the Oil or Tax collectors will increase.
- REVISED POWER-UPS: Power-Up stats increased; cooldown timers introduced.
- LESS TAPS – MORE WARMONGERING:
*ONE-TAP COIN GATHERING: Gather coins across all of your base with ease.
*ONE-TAP FUSION: Mass-fuse all of your units.
*ONE-TAP ROBOT REFUELING.
*PvP-INTEL UI REWORKED: See the power of your enemies right on the World Map.

ADDITIONAL CONTENT:
- 11 NEW NATIONAL FLAGS: Your Faction may now fight with the flags of Belgium, Chile, Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Poland, Romania, Taiwan, Thailand, Saudi Arabia or Vietnam on its banner!
- FLOWERBED BOOSTER: In the flag colors of one of 15 nations.

WHAT'S NEW

TAKE COMMAND... PERSONALLY!
Lead your army as a Commander – a unique hero that represents you in the game. Commanders have a strong impact on nearly every aspect of the gameplay.

COMMANDER GEAR
Equip your Commander with special new gear that boosts your abilities in battles, Faction Wars, events and even the performance of base facilities.

NEW LOTTERY
Get units, resources and Commander gear from all-new Cargo Chests!

NEW EVENTS WINDOW
Now with more visibility, added functionality and detailed information about the goals & rewards of all running events.

The war has lasted too long. The cruelty that soldiers witnessed on the battlefield has left a scar on their sanity. Prepare yourself for Halloween's Special Update!

HALLOWEEN BASE BREACH
What dangers hide in this thick enigmatic fog? Why is the ground scorched around the fog? Brace yourself for the Time-Limited Halloween version of the KRA Base Breach event!

HALLOWEEN CHESTS
For a limited time — get the all-new Halloween Chest with Halloween-themed units inside!
Warning: Halloween Chests and Keys are valid until 7-11-2017.

It’s time to draw a line in the snow! Claim the Arctic for your nation before rival nations claim it for themselves!

CONSTRUCT A FROZEN FORTRESS
Build and expand your stronghold within the unforgiving Arctic. Mine resources, build defenses, assemble special units adapted for sub-zero operations, and develop your stake in this frozen battlefield.
COLD-BLOODED COMBAT!
Get your hands on your rival’s precious resources by deploying units and power-ups to melt their defenses under a barrage of firepower.

Prepare to melt the snow in the winter update of World at Arms!

THROUGH BULLETS AND BLIZZARDS
Push into the KRA’s northern territory in a new series of limited-time events.

NEW COMMANDER: ARCTIC SOLDIER
Rescue Captain Josh and his men in a special Base Breach event to recruit this new and highly skilled Commander to your army.

COMMANDER BONUSES
Each Commander now has their own unique set of passive bonuses. So choose the one that suits your needs for the day!
SURPRISE IN THE PEN
Check out the freighter near the Submarine Pen to get a glimpse of what's coming next!
